data.text: @colbyley1 @CBCNS So again, I ask you, when would you have taken off the restrictions? What do you think the trigger should be? I'm not asking sarcastically, I would like to know your opinion. A complaint is fine, but only holds weight if you can suggest how it could be better (good or bad)

@CassieDoran7 @CBCNS The facts are that things are only “going back to normal” for those who are lucky enough to not be immunocompromised, or live with someone who is. We’re running the risk of making the “normal world” inaccessible to them for a longer period of time for our convenience.

@colbyley1 @CBCNS Ps. 3x Vax, work in Healthcare, and have followed restrictions the whole way through, AND have agreed with them. So before you judge someone about not having common sense or caring for others with your sanctimonious tongue, consider it's  POSSIBLE you may not have all the facts

@colbyley1 @CBCNS I'm not without sympathy at all. We have all struggled through this together, and agree we should continue to take precautions. Why are you so upset at an attempt to return life to normal a bit? 
And please answer, if not now, then when? What do you think the trigger should be?

@colbyley1 @CBCNS Was not close to what I said.
We have the luxury of electing officials who make these rules - we chose them. We the luxury of being able to move around our country if we don't like the rules in our province. We have the luxury of being able to continue to wear a mask if we choose

@colbyley1 @CBCNS Who are you quoting? I must have missed the comment you have in quotation marks.
Ooooh, that was supposed to be me? Seems you need to go back to school as well and learn how to use punctuation.

@CassieDoran7 @CBCNS What kind of logic is that? “Yeah let’s take all the people that have common sense and care for the more vulnerable and tell them to relocate for the sake of my convenience.” You realize how childish you are right? Go back to elementary school if you wanna act like that
@LostTogetherCda @Janet25127309 @CBCNS I hope they stop here soon I got everywhere with a disposable mask under my fabric mask already and no one can explain to me why it’s necessary
@MushroomWilted @CBCNS Yeah that’s just the reported number, there is likely a huge number of unreported, I am also unreported and undiagnosed
